texts.subHeader: Please map the columns from your CSV to the appropriate fields. The application needs to know which column in your CSV contains the following data, and in some cases, you need to specify which data in the CSV rows corresponds to the values required for that data type.
texts.ageGroupInfo: Only add values that represent age groups you want to filter by. Values representing age groups not added will be ignored by the system, meaning they can be placed in any group when this criterion is considered.

texts.subHeader: First, upload a CSV file. To get this format, first convert your data: Excel: File->Save As->.CSV. Google Sheets: File->Download->Comma-separated values (.csv). Google Forms: Responses->â‹® (menu)->Download responses (.csv).
texts.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your CSV file here, or click to select one

texts.subHeader: Upload a file to begin the presentation.

fields.minLeaders: Minimum number of group leaders per group
fields.splitByTargetAge: Assign Groupmates Considering Preferred Age Group
